q: In crystal structure of MgO, ionic radius of each of Mg2+ and O2- is respectively 0.0659 and 0.139 nm. What will be the position of Mg2+ ions ?

a.1: In the octahedral void of cubic close packing arrangement.
a.3: Some in octahedral voids and some in tetrahedral voids.

a.3: a = b = c, α = β = γ ≠ 90°
